summary: Philip LaChapelle Jr. is identified as a former Security and Intelligence clerk. He is connected to Kenneth C. Griggs, a PFC who defected, by providing information about Griggs' experiences prior to his defection. This information included alleged mistreatment and emotional issues. LaChapelle Jr. wrote a letter to Cecil L. Griggs, Kenneth's adopted father, in November 1967. Cecil L. Griggs also wrote a letter to LaChapelle Jr. around the same time. The documents suggest that LaChapelle Jr. had knowledge of Griggs' situation before his defection, making him a source of information for investigators.
